{label:"„Éõ„Éº„É†„Å´Êàª„Çã üè†",isHome:true}]},// B„É´„Éº„Éà
gold_card:{text:"„Ç≥„Çπ„Éà„Éë„Éï„Ç©„Éº„Éû„É≥„Çπ„Å®„Çπ„ÉÜ„Éº„Çø„Çπ„ÅÆ‰∏°Á´ã‚ú®\n„Éù„Ç§„É≥„ÉàÈÇÑÂÖÉÁéá„ÇÇÈ≠ÖÂäõ„ÅÆ1Êûö„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ",image:"/image/goald.png",options:[{label:"Ë©≥Á¥∞„ÇíË¶ã„Çã ",url:"#"},{label:"„Éõ„Éº„É†„Å´Êàª„Çã ",isHome:true}]}};const[currentId,setCurrentId]=useState("intro");const currentScenario=scenarios[currentId];// „Éú„Çø„É≥„ÇíÊäº„Åó„Åü„Å®„Åç„ÅÆÂá¶ÁêÜ

}else if(option.url){window.open(option.url,"_blank");}else if(option.nextId){setCurrentId(option.nextId);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ad-screen-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ad-screen",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bot-icon",children:"\uD83D\uDCB3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"message-bubble",children:currentScenario.text.split("\n").map((line,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(React.Fragment,{children:[line,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]},index))})]}),currentScenario.carousel&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-scroll",children:currentScenario.carousel.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.src,alt:"carousel"})},index))}),currentScenario.image&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bot-icon invisible",children:"\uD83E\uDD16"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-bubble",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:currentScenario.image,alt:"content"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"options-area",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"options-card",children:[currentScenario.selectLabel&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"options-label",children:currentScenario.selectLabel}),currentScenario.options.map((option,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"chat-option-btn",onClick:()=>handleOptionClick(option),children:option.label},index))]})})]})})});};export default AdChatbot;
